summary: Completed testing of ZWAP! Coin PWA - AboutPage scrolling fix and blockchain integration. All backend tests passed (14/14). Frontend navigation and UI verified working.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/blockchain/contract-info returns connected:true, symbol:ZWAP, decimals:18 - PASSED
Backend: /api/blockchain/balance/{wallet} returns on-chain balance from Polygon - PASSED
Backend: User CRUD endpoints working - PASSED
Backend: Shop, Swap, Leaderboard endpoints working - PASSED
Frontend: AboutPage scrolling - 'Get Started' button visible and accessible - PASSED
Frontend: AboutPage 'Get Started' navigates to /dashboard - PASSED
Frontend: Dashboard loads with header showing ZWAP balance and zPts - PASSED
Frontend: Header shows 'Connect Wallet' button when not connected - PASSED
Frontend: Header logo, profile badge (ðŸ‘¤) present - PASSED
Frontend: Shop page shows Zupreme Imports branding and categories - PASSED
Frontend: Swap page shows Live Prices with ZWAP, BTC, ETH, POL, SOL - PASSED
Frontend: Wallet modal shows MetaMask, Trust Wallet, Speed Wallet options - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Blockchain integration with Polygon working correctly via Alchemy RPC
ZWAP contract (0xe8898453af13b9496a6e8ada92c6efdaf4967a81) verified on Polygon mainnet
AboutPage scroll fix implemented with fixed position overflow:auto container
On-chain balance fetching implemented in AppHeader.jsx
test_credentials: No auth required - wallet connection uses WalletConnect
seed_data_creation: Test users created with TEST_ prefix during pytest run

real_apis: Blockchain balance endpoint - REAL on-chain data from Polygon
Blockchain contract-info endpoint - REAL contract data

context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) AboutPage scrolling fixed - 'Get Started' button accessible at bottom 2) Blockchain integration working - /api/blockchain/contract-info returns connected:true, symbol:ZWAP, decimals:18 3) /api/blockchain/balance/{wallet} returns real on-chain balance from Polygon 4) Dashboard header shows ZWAP balance and zPts 5) Navigation between tabs works. Note: Most wallets will show 0 ZWAP balance unless they actually hold ZWAP tokens on Polygon mainnet.
